info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 4:01PM EDT until May 15 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield VA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia...
James River At Cartersville affecting Goochland, Cumberland and Powhatan Counties.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia...
James River At Richmond Westham affecting City of Richmond, Chesterfield and Henrico Counties.
James River At Richmond Locks affecting City of Richmond and Henrico County.
Rivanna River At Palmyra affecting Fluvanna County.
For the Lower James Basin...including Richmond Locks, Richmond Westham, Cartersville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the James River...including Palmyra...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Rivanna River at Palmyra.
* WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight.
* IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Farmland flooded downstream, including a section of Carysbrook Road.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:50 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 21.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 17.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:50 PM EDT Wednesday was 22.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 6.2 feet early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.9 feet on 04/24/1983. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 100 AM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT
